name: blue-flare
caption: Blue Flare

effect.short: Has a 20% chance to [burn]{mechanic:burn} the target.
effect.full: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}.  Has a 20% chance to [burn]{mechanic:burn} the target.

flavorText:
The user attacks by engulfing the target in an
intense, yet beautiful, blue flame. This may also leave
the target with a burn.
